messages.content: You are tasked with creating a structured output from the provided user message.

Files containing the implementation of App\Http\Controllers\Api\V1\PostController@show:

- app/Http/Controllers/Api/V1/PostController.php

Explanation:
- routes/api.php registers Route::apiResource('posts', PostController::class)->only(['index', 'show']); under the v1 prefix, so the GET /v1/posts/{post} route is handled by App\Http\Controllers\Api\V1\PostController@show.
- The show method is implemented in app/Http/Controllers/Api/V1/PostController.php as:
  public function show(Post $post): PostResource
  which returns a new PostResource($post).
- There are other PostController classes in the project (e.g., app/Http/Controllers/PostController.php and app/Http/Controllers/Admin/PostController.php), but those are in different namespaces and are not the handler for the API route /v1/posts/{post}.

files.description: List of paths to the files that contain the handler implementations.
files.title: Files
